struct.name: RegistrationCredentials
struct.doc: The encrypted OTC (to be decrypted and used by the remote device) and the Security Management Server URL

member.name: deviceId
member.doc: The device identification generated by Qeo.

member.name: requestRSAPublicKey
member.doc: The PEM-encoded public key generated by the remote device requesting a registration.

member.name: encryptedOtc
member.doc: The OTC (encrypted with the above public key using PKCS1 OEAP padding) to be used by the remote device

member.name: realmName
member.doc: The name of the realm to use
